DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . CD4 count > = 500 cells/mm3 . No evidence AIDS . No antiretroviral therapy within 30 day prior study entry . NOTE : Presence lymphadenopathy two extrainguinal site , least 1 cm diameter 3 month , permit . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Clinically significant abnormality routine hematology ( CD4 count Western blot ) , serum chemistry , urinalysis . Abnormal EKG . Positive stool guaiac . Abnormal medical history physical exam include temperature , heart rate , blood pressure . Clinically significant organ abnormality disease . Positive urine drug screen illicit drug . Inability comply study procedure . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Routine treatment nonprescription medication . Treatment medication except approval investigator . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Prior participation trial . Serious physical mental illness within 1 year prior study entry would confound interpretation data . Prior Medication : Excluded : Antiretroviral therapy within 30 day prior study entry . Known medication alter renal , hepatic , hematologic/immunologic function ( barbiturate , phenothiazine , cimetidine , immunomodulators ) within 14 day prior study entry . Routine treatment nonprescription medication within 3 day prior study entry . History alcohol drug abuse within past year .
